[pygments.lexers]
Ansible-output = sphinx_ansible_theme._pygments.lexer:AnsibleOutputLexer
ansible-output = sphinx_ansible_theme._pygments.lexer:AnsibleOutputLexer

[pygments.styles]
Ansible = sphinx_ansible_theme._pygments.style:AnsibleStyle
ansible = sphinx_ansible_theme._pygments.style:AnsibleStyle

[sphinx.html_themes]
sphinx_ansible_theme = sphinx_ansible_theme
